alchemylab.flavor: Take use of the alchemy lab

crew.flavor: to venture down into the mine.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to repair potential old machinery in the mine.

crystal.flavor: to use for light as you venture down the mine.
to power up potential old machinery in the mine.

minersguild.flavor: to ensure that you have the machinery needed to be able to mine what you can.
to make sure you have a strategy for how to mine the most resources.

workshop.flavor: to make sure your facilities don't get broken too badly.
to be prepared to fix potentially broken tools.

alchemy.flavor: to create a strength potion for your crew.

alchemylab.flavor: to have ready possible healing potions if injuries occur.
to prepare antidotes if they catch new diseases.

cleric.flavor: to bless the expedition in hopes that it will be successful.
to boost the faith of the crew so that they will not faulter.

ambassador.flavor: to be diplomatic with potential encounters.
to act as a diplomatic safety net in case you meet unknown humanoids.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to repair potential old machinery in the quarry.

crystal.flavor: to use for light as you venture down the quarry.
to power up potential old machinery in the quarry.

workshop.flavor: to make sure your facilities don't get broken too badly when in the quarry.

alchemy.flavor: to create strength potions so you can get as much from the quarry as possible.

alchemylab.flavor: to have ready possible healing potions if injuries occur.

cleric.flavor: to bless the expedition in hopes that it will be successful.

ambassador.flavor: to be diplomatic with potential encounters.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to repair potential old machinery in the wreckage.

crystal.flavor: to use for light as you enter the wreckage.
to power up potential old machinery within the wreckage.

minersguild.flavor: to ensure that you have the machinery needed to be able to use the wreckage to your advantage.

alchemy.flavor: to create a oil that can be used on the wreckage.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to create a potential shelter if needed.

crystal.flavor: to use for light to guide you through the forest.
to signal your presence in the woods.

minersguild.flavor: to ensure that you have the machinery needed to be able to gather what you can.

workshop.flavor: to make sure your facilities don't get broken too badly.

alchemylab.flavor: to have ready possible new research that can be made from your findings.

cleric.flavor: to bless the expedition in hopes that it will be successful.

ambassador.flavor: to be diplomatic with potential encounters.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to create bridges between the rocks.

crystal.flavor: to hopefully bind the rocks together.
to create a beacon so your castle can pick you up.

minersguild.flavor: to ensure that you have the machinery needed to be able to gather what you can.

alchemy.flavor: to create a anti-gravity potion so your crew don't fall to their death.

cleric.flavor: to bless the expedition in hopes that it will be successful.

ambassador.flavor: to be diplomatic with potential encounters.

crew.flavor: to travel to the magic area below.

material.flavor: to repair items that may get broken.
to create shielding from potential harmful magic.

crystal.flavor: to use for a magical counter measure.
to combine with other magical essenses that might be down there.

minersguild.flavor: to ensure that you have the machinery needed to be able to gather what you can.

to create a makeshift boat.
to create a raft to go onto the lake.

to shine light on whatever might be in the water.

to rebuild old artifacts that may prove useful.

to power up potential ancient machinery in the ruins.

cleric.flavor: to bless the expedition in hopes that it will be successful.

ambassador.flavor: to be diplomatic with potential encounters.

flavors.flavor: Success! More resources than planned.
Your castle member returns with extra materials.
the castle member were able to collect more than planned.
A little extra resources are always good, and your castle member got just that.
The quest was sucessful, and you were able to collect more resources.
Your castle member is barely able to carry all his findings back!
As the castle member is returning, you see that the power crystal is shining a bit more brightly than before,
The castle member was able to find some sort of fragment that resembles your power crystal a lot.
Among the material collected, you also find a power crystal fragment.
As you look through the resources brought back, you see something shining.
The mission was successful.
Nothing bad seems to have happened.
Not the best results, but it is something.
You would expect the castle member to be more efficient, but this was not the case.
At least nobody died.
The mission was successful.
Nothing bad seems to have happened.
Not the best results, but it is something.
You would expect the castle member to be more efficient, but this was not the case.
At least nobody died.
As the castle member returns, the gathering room is reacting to the compounds, and is damaged.
Some of the equipment were badly damaged whilst gathering materials.
As the castle member returns, the gathering room starts smoking. Something went wrong.
Your castle member seems to be injured from the quest, and as he returns, he manages to thow the resources into the gathering room and damage some of the equipment there.
Your castle member were barely able to make it back. He is lucky to be alive.
Your gathering room were unable to handle the resources gathered, and burst up in flames!
The gathering room exploded from some weird reaction.
Your gathering room collapsed in on itself after trying to rearrange some of the equipment after use.
One of your rooms mysteriously collapsed, and a castle member got injured in the process.
Your castle member never returned. His life will forever be remembered.
Within the findings that were brought back, you find something that looks like an alchemical compound.
You see some strange new material within the resources that were collected.
The brave souls have returned, and are carrying more resources than expected, along with a strange plant.
Your castle members really went out of their way, and collected extra resources and some weird looking mushrooms.
Some strange growth was found on the quest, along with an abundancy of materials.
The quest was very bountyful indeed. As the members return, they bring with them a strange new material, and the power crystal seems to be shining more brightly!
One castle member is carrying extra materials, and the other has some strange-looking plant.
Happy with the findings, your castle members return with much extra alchemical compound.
On their quest they found an area rich with alchemical ingredients.
The crew members packs are full of green plants and colorful flowers that can be used to create potions.
Your castle members returns with extra resources.
You will be pleased to know that the persons you sent out, have returned with additional resources.
As your castle members come back, you see that they have problems carrying the extra findings.
It has been a good day, and your castle members just returned with more resources than expected.
With their backpacks bulging, your castle members return with many riches,
Your castle members returns with extra resources.
You will be pleased to know that the persons you sent out, have returned with additional resources.
As your castle members come back, you see that they have problems carrying the extra findings.
It has been a good day, and your castle members just returned with more resources than expected.
With their backpacks bulging, your castle members return with many riches,
Your castle members did a great job collecting all they could, but one of them got injured on the way back.
As the castle members return, one of them hurts his back from carrying all the resources.
One of your castle members went out of his way to try to reach some extra materials, but got injured in the process.
A returning castle member seems to have a broken leg, but at least he carried out his duty.
You weren't able to find much, but you found something at least.
Only one crew member returns, as the other was unable to make it back alive.
The quest was completed, but one of the members died along the way.
One of the castle members got poisoned somehow, and did not make it back.
Only one member returns, as the other one died from exhaustion.
Trying to collect more materials, there was an accident. and one of the castle members got badly injured.

mine.flavor: As you approach, you spot a mine. The tracks look old but somewhat functional
There is a large opening in one of the mountains. it is an old mine. there are still residues of minerals shining in the light.
Something smells like coal and iron. upon investigating the surroundings, you discover a mine that looks rich in minerals.

quarry.flavor: This place has clearly been an expedition point some time, because they left a huge quarry behind..
This looks like some sort of crater. when close up, however, you see that it is in fact a large quarry.
Upon arrival at the island, you see a large quarry in the center. this location has obviously had a lot of riches, but are there any left?

wreckage.flavor: The rubbles from an airship remain on the edge of the island
You see a huge structure that looks like your castle.
An old airship seems to have crashed here long ago.

factory.flavor: You see an old construction site nearby.
An abandoned factory appears in the distance.
You spot the ruins of an old factory.

village.flavor: There seems to be a collection of houses and different sort of building here, from the looks of it.
In the distance you see an old village. you are not completely sure if there are anyone still living here.
Whoever raised all these buildings sure knew what they were doing. The constructions are fascinating.

forest.flavor: As you approach, you see nothing but green forests all over.
In the distance, through the mist, you see trees the size of giant castles. This forest seems neverending and massive, yet beautiful to behold.
Green. That is the color you see. Trees upon trees as far as the eyes can see. This forest is a beautiful sight.

rockformation.flavor: As you approach, you become aware of rocks floating around you in clusters. It seems like a dangerous place for people who don't know where to place their feet.
As you come close, your castle is almost hit by all the floating rocks that are floating all over. Something is making the earth behave like this.
This "island" is more like the remains of a comet that has exploded. There are floating rock formations everywhere, clustered together. It is possible to walk on them, but caution is advised.

magicsite.flavor: There is a thin layer of floating dust and rocks on the ground. The entire area seem to be filled with magic.
As you arrive, you feel a strange energy flowing all over the area. Magical sparks are appearing in the air around you, and the plants around are sort of glowing.
There are glowing sigils all over the ground in this area. Clearly this site has been used for magical practices.

lake.flavor: You see a large blue lake filled with glimmering reflections on the surface. It is truly a beautiful sight.
At your arrival, you see a giant lake where there are fish jumping up of the water, leaving perfect ripples all across the face of the water.
When you approach the island, you are having a hard time picking an entry point. You spot a safe place next to the giant lake that seems to make up most of the island.

ruins.flavor: As you come closer, you see a formation of rocks and clay. It is ancient ruins and there are large structures with ancient writings around.
There is nothing but rubble and broken constructions all around. These ruins must be from a previous millenia.
As you arrive, you see the remnants of what used to be a great civilization. The ruins are astounding, and there has clearly been people living here at some point in time.

cathedral.flavor: You spot a cathedral of some sort. You are not quite sure what it is, but it sure is massive!

settlement.flavor: When landing on the island, you see something resembling a town hall. Maybe there are people there.

main.flavor: You realize this place used to belong to
You see some remnants of a faction that have been here
There are traces of beings that have lived around here.
This place reminds you of another place you have seen before. You recall someone who lives like this.

second.flavor: it is unclear if they are still here.
Maybe some of them are nearby?

extra.flavor: You will have to remain careful.

endflavor.flavor: As you reach this island, you realize that you have found the way home. You survived the journey. GOOD JOB!
Your castle runs out of control and crashes into an island. The castle collapse and everybody dies. THE END!
When reaching the final island, you remember that magic and power crystals don't really exist. So you wake yourself up, and get out of bed.

alchemy.flavor: Within your findings, you discover a new alchemical material.
As you unload your bags from the expedition on the island, you see a strange new spore on one of your castle member's shoe.
What is this? Some chemical material that has never been seen before!
On the island, you were able to extract some sort of new and weird plant.
Your castle member has found a strange new plant that can be used in alchemy.
Your castle member returns with a new alchemical compound.

scrap.flavor: Your expedition yielded some usable building materials.
There were some new materials down on the island that you thought could be used in your castle.
Your castle crew scavenged all the materials possible.
You were able to gather a bit of building material from the island.

crewinjured.flavor: During the quest, a castle member got badly injured and need medical attention.
One of your castle members twisted his foot whilst stepping on to the island, and needs some medical attention.
One of your crew has fallen ill with some type of nasty flu.
Your castle member returns from the quest with minor injuries. He should visit the medical ward nonetheless.

crewdead.flavor: One castle member was unable to make it back alive. May he rest in peace.
While entering the area, one of your crew member choked on a piece of bread from his lunch and suffocated.
After feeling ill for some time, one of your castle member has fallen down lifeless.
Unfortunately for the person down on the island, he were bitten by a venomous snake, and died after only 10 seconds.
Your castle member suffered an allergic reaction to some substance down on the island. He didn't make it.

crewrecruited.flavor: While on the island, a strange figure wanted to join your forces and help your cause.
As you head back to the castle, you see a man standing infront of the gates. He wants to team up with you.
You were able to recruit a new soul down on the island. Welcome aboard!
Your crew's diplomatic skillset was enough to convince an islander to join your forces.

crewrecruitedinjured.flavor: Down on the island, you found a man who was badly injured. He agrees to join you if you are able to mend his wounds.
Heading back, you see a person crawling on his stomach, making a painful sound. You decide to recruit him and heal him back to health.
A person wants to join your castle crew, but he is in need of some medicine.
You found a wounded man on the island, and he agreed to join your forces if you can heal him.

energygained.flavor: While completing the quest, your castle member found a crystal that looks identical to the one powering your castle.
Somehow, your castle's power crystal is shining more brightly now than it did before.
As you enter your castle again, the power crystal flashes a massive flash and is now more potent than before.
You were able to uncover a piece of crystal from the island, and you bring it back to the castle.

energylost.flavor: As you return from your quest, you notice that the power crystal in your castle is glowing less brightly.
As you fly away from the island, a piece of your power crystal falls off.
You are not sure just why, but your power crystal is fading slowly.
When returning from the quest, your power crystal seems to have been drained from sources unknown.
When landing on the surface, you hit too hard, and the power crystal flickers and shines a little less bright.

roomdamaged.flavor: When retreating from the island, one of your rooms seems to be shaking uncontrollably.
Having overused your spacial capacity, one of your rooms starts to crack in the walls.
One of your castle members has gone berserk in a room and damaged a lot of its contents.
When your crew returns from the island, they unpack, but something seems to have reacted with the atmosphere and a room starts to crumble.

roomdestroyed.flavor: Something happened on your castle as you landed on the island, and one of your rooms caved in on itself.
Your power crystal overcharged, and a beam of magic light hit one of your rooms and destroyed it.
There was some sort of reaction happening in one of the rooms as your castle crew returned. It blew up!
The latest attempt to take off from the island, caused one of your rooms to collaps on itself.

roomgained.flavor: While exploring the island, you discover a new way of expanding your castle magically.
As you return to your castle, you see that a new room has magically appeared!
Your castle crew have found new strength, and are willing to expand the castle.
Engraved on a rock, you see a layout of a structure that might be benefitial to your castle.
